synopsis.text: Heiji Hattori, a high school detective from Osaka, teams up with Conan when a wrong number at Mori Kogoro's private detective agency leads them to a blackmail call. The duo embarks on a mission to find the stolen jewel worth a whopping 100 million yen. But they're not alone in their quest; the notorious master thief Kaitou Kid is also after the precious gem. In a thrilling race against time, Heiji and Conan must outsmart the cunning thief and unmask the culprit before it's too late. Will they be able to recover the stolen jewel and bring the perpetrator to justice? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
